content: up at once the first st back on the left n place the st on the right n back to the left n k2 c2r cable two to the right with the right n sl off the two first sts of the left n as if to k2tog place the first st then the second st of the right n back to the left n k2tbl braid horizontal vikkel braid k1 symbol « 1 » on the chart in the mc slipped st and keep that slipped st on the left needle k2togtbl place st back on left n yo k2togtbl repeat steps between later brackets take care to tighten up a bit the yo and to keep the k2togtbl a bit loose b st a stitch of the vikkel braid always in mc video link video with part one vikkel braid and part two how to pick up the last gusset stitch https //youtu be/72wffbge95o cuff with mc and the bigger n cast on using german twisted cast on or another stretchy cast on of your choice 64 72 80 stitches join in the round taking care not to twist place a marker for the begining of the round with the smaller n work the cuff according to the cuff chart starting with mc when alternating the yarns at each round don t twist the yarns work the cuff chart 16 18 20 times in the round work the 2 rds 8 times repeat round 1 once more for a total of 17 rds sock shoes 2024 imawale designs - all rights reserved 2 leg with the bigger n knit one round with cc work the leg according to the leg chart work the leg chart 16 18 20 times in the round work the 8 rds 5 4 4 times repeat once more rds 1-3 1-7 1-3 for a total of 43 39 35 rds for a shorter or a longer leg add or leave out a full pattern repeat back of shoe part it is the part at the back of the leg that creates the sock shoe and the braid around it to center the motif the front of the leg n1 will have 33 37 41 sts and the back of the leg n2 will have 31 35 39 sts work according to the leg chart on n1 knit and slip the first st of n2 to n1 on n2 work according to the back of shoe chart row 0 depending on the size chosen framed in blue size 64 sts in red size 72 sts in green size 80 sts continue to work in the round now according to the leg/instep chart on n1 starting with row 5 1 5 and according to the back of shoe chart on n2 when the braid has reached the first and the last back of leg sts the front of the leg ends with a row 8 of the leg/instep chart the leg has a total of
